text: Anata gata no shui no (yuboku no) Arabia hito no naka ni mo, mata madina no shimin no naka ni mo, haishin-sha ga iru. Kare-ra wa gizen ni shuchaku shite iru. Anata wa kare-ra o shiranai. Daga ware wa shitte iru. Kare wa 2-kai ni watari kare-ra o chobatsu shi, sonogo kare-ra wa, omoi chobatsu ni kake rarerudearou
